note.title: ***Template Description***
note.para: This template forms the basis for a procedure which can best be described as having an order of complexity above Template_Two. It consists of a sequence of steps which result in a separate (new) dialog. The dialog is displayed following the relevant step. A table (or numerous tables) are included which describe the fields within a dialog. Any field which includes a set of pre-defined choices is detailed in a separate table. This table is linked to from the parent table.

The added complexity of this template is a single link to a set of links at the end of the procedure. These links link to further procedures applicable to an interface which has many options and can therefore follow many paths. Each path is described in its own procedure. Links to related concepts may also be listed in the link set.

note.title: ***Template instructions***
note.para: 1. The procedure id (and the resultant file name for the procedure) is the same as the title of the main dialog where possible.
Otherwise choose a logical name describing the task or procedure.
* THE proc-HIB-Template_Three.xml filename will be changed to proc-HIB-Procedure_Name.xml"
2. The figure names reflect the procedure name numbered according to their position in the procedure.
3. For dialogs consisting of multiple fields produce a table in a separate step immediately following the dialog with the following fields:
4. Where there are multiple options for a particular field, produce a second table below the first with the titles:
Where Label is the choice available and the description describes the result of selecting that option.
Link to this secondary table from the Description field of the parent table.

5. For an interface having many options which, when selected, results in different paths (or interfaces) provide a single link to a "link set". This section will include a screenshot of the relevant interface and links to further procedures and related concepts.
